typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrc
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> emp2nd
empsrc, emp2nd union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['union_Data.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> target
